title: Riddex Plus
transcripts:
Speaker 1: It's that time of year again, roaches, rats and mice living and growing in your walls, attics, kitchen and bathroom, around your kids, pets and food. Introducing the new Riddex Plus, a revolutionary simple plug-in device that sends digital pulses through the wiring in your walls, designed to drive roaches, rats and mice right out of your house. All you do is simply plug it in, a single Riddex Plus is built to protect one level of a typical house, apartment or condominium. It's that simple. That's why Riddex is one of the top-selling pest control products with millions of units sold. Thanks to Riddex Plus there may be no need to have strangers come into your home spraying poison around your children, food and pets. Just plug in Riddex Plus and you're entire house could be bug free.

Speaker 2: It saves me money, and I don't have to pay the bug guy to come around and spray all those chemicals in my house.

Speaker 3: I've been using Riddex Plus for years. It's the only repeller that truly works. Thanks, Riddex.

Speaker 4: It saves me money because I don't have to buy all those chemicals and traps. Riddex just makes me happy.

Speaker 1: Tired of spending hundreds of dollars every year getting rid of roaches or rats? Tired of having strangers coming into your home spraying poisons around your children, pets and food? Now, you can say no to chemicals with the Riddex Plus Plug-in Bug Repeller with digital technology.

Speaker 2: Riddex Plus really worked. You just plug it in. there's no refills or anything to replace, and it got rid of my roaches and mice.

Speaker 3: I know it's working because there's no more roaches.

Speaker 4: You just plug it in and forget about it.

Speaker 1: So remember, to help get rid of rats and roaches, get the Number 1 selling pest control product, Riddex Plus, today.
